body.name: MAONO Wireless Microphone, UHF Handheld Cordless Dynamic Mic, 20 UHF Frequencies Karaoke Mic, Cordless Microphone for Singing, Karaoke, DJ, Singing, Church, Speech, Wedding,262 ft Range (WM760 A2)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 8 mins
features: ♪ 🎤SIGNAL STABILITY & AGAINST INTERFERENCE -UHF wireless capability provides a stronger clearer signal and better sound quality, reducing the possibility of interference and dropouts. Maono dynamic UHF wireless microphone with up to 262ft operating range, lets you get around the venue or work the room untethered.20 Sets of Frequency Adjustment and external antennae allow you simultaneously use in the same area,(Each Set Using In Different Channel), avoiding interference signals at any time.

♪ 🎤STUDIO QUALITY SOUND - With advanced circuitry design, the WM760 wireless microphone translates into less total harmonic distortion (THD) of 0.99%. With a high SNR of 91±1dB, the microphone's signal strength is enhanced, delivering an exceptional auditory experience that's free from unwanted noise and interference. (NOTE: The receiver and each microphone are requires 2AA battery power, which is not included in the product.)

♪ 🎤SIMPLE & COMPACT DETAIL DESIGN-MAONO wireless mic custom-made 30mm microphone core is used, and the distance between the microphone core and the top of the net head is 12mm, Reduces interference and restores the truest clear voice, Ensures maximum gain before feedback and makes your voice cut through any mix. Metal aluminum alloy mesh makes a firmer and more Stable Structure and Ensures Stable Product Performance. Simple and Compact Design but Comfortable and Full of Fashion.

♪ 🎤PLUG AND PLAY, EASY TO USE-Just turn on the wireless microphone system, then the receiver will sync the frequency with the transmitter automatically, then the connection is done, and no setup is required. Thanks to the more user-friendly design, you can adjust the frequency and volume without having to remove the lid, avoiding embarrassment during your presentation or church event.

♪ 🎤TWO-YEAR WORRY-FREE GUARANTEE - MAONO provides every WM760 wireless handheld microphone customer with TWO-Year-Warranty! If you are not satisfied with this microphone for singing or have any other questions, please feel free to contact us before returning. we promise to offer you satisfactory solutions. (NOTE: Batteries are not included, each microphone requires 2AA batteries, the receiver requires 2AA batteries and a total of 6AA batteries is required )

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Professional Performance 2 262ft Operating Range 3 20 Groups of Frequencies

How to adjust the volume of the microphone? You can adjust the volume of the microphone by the upper button to increase the volume, while the lower button to decreases it. How to adjust the frequencies of the microphone? Hold the "upper button" and "lower button" for three seconds to enter frequency switching mode, Press the "upper button" and "lower button" to move to switch frequency, which will end automatically after 10s. Is it possible to connect this to a karaoke speaker? Yes, If your karaoke speaker has a 6.35mm or 3.5mm input interface, you can easily connect the receiver to it. Does the receiver need batteries? Batteries are not included in the product and require a separate purchase, the receiver requires 2AA batteries, each microphone requires 2AA batteries, and a total requires 6AA batteries. Is it normal to encounter intermittent cut-outs during use? Although we designed the WM760 with environmental interference in mind, some interference is unavoidable. At this point, you can adjust the frequency of the microphone, which can minimize the interference during your use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works good, connects with my guitar amp, perfect for karaoke

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Drains batteries fast
reviews.reviewText: I used for one day and a half and brand new, good quality batteries were drained.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mic for the price
reviews.reviewText: So I originally got this for work when we hold special events and it works great with our PA. Ive also used it with a bluetooth speaker using the adapter and it worked great. Also got it to work with my phone which was kinda neat. Overall happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nah, it make noises.
reviews.reviewText: I sold it to a client. But the mic starts to make scratching noises at 30 to 40 feet distance. You need to stand at 10 feet to be sure. The transmitter has 3 leds, the one in the middle, when blicks, is because there is a signal problem. I was using them for the first time and the middle light was blicking, I changed batteries, and still. I was already in a corporate presentation so... this is all we had. It ran well for the five minutes the person spoke, but I was lucky.The bad problem is that when is losing signal you hear a very loud noise in the speakers, that is a no no!So... I would suggest to skip this product. It sounds good when it works but I was not able to solve the blinking light problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for non-professional
reviews.reviewText: These are actually really good for the price, but definitely not professional quality. My husband is the lead singer in a cover band in Vegas and there is no way he could use this mic instead of the equipment he has, but as far as MC and small gathering microphones, it is better than most. I certainly like the way the children sound on these mics a lot more than the old ones they were using!
